As P6, I'm approaching this game with a focus on identifying key players and understanding their motivations. I value strategic thinking and adaptability. I appreciate clarity and honesty, so I'm curious about how each of you envisions your gameplay and trust. Let's engage constructively while keeping an eye on our individual survival.
